page.title: 06MILTON JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: We have some annual events,such as sports days ,prize giving and a Christmas Nativity Play or Carol Service.The school year begins in September and is divided into three terms,each lasting approximately thirteen weeks.We have two weeks holiday both at Christmas and at Easter;six weeks in the summer and one week near the middle of each term. Compared with many junior schools in the area,we are well off for equipment and facilities. We have a large playground and playing field and showers which we use after sporting activities.As well as the classrooms we have separate rooms for music, television and video,maths and science and the computer.
